name: I Want Toilet!!!!!!
description: A 2d game with "Real" physics and contains many actions and decryption elements .
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
